headline: Option Volatility And Earnings Report For February 16 - 20
summary: Earnings season is starting to slow down now, which may come as a welcome relief for some. However, we do still have some important companies due to report with Walmart, Alibaba, Newmont Mining, Medtronic, Palo Alto Networks, DoorDash and Occidental Petroleum all set to report.

headline: Occidental Petroleum Debt Reset Reframes Cash Flows And Future Resilience
summary: Occidental Petroleum (NYSE:OXY) has been actively reducing its debt, supported by substantial cash flow generation. The company is focusing on lowering interest expenses while refining its operational segments, including Midstream and Marketing. These balance sheet moves come at a time of elevated investor attention and recent analyst downgrades. Occidental Petroleum is a large integrated energy company with upstream production, chemicals, and a Midstream and Marketing segment that helps...

headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Valuation After Earnings Concerns And Lower Analyst Expectations
summary: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) has come under pressure after shares declined ahead of its fourth quarter 2025 earnings report, as analysts flagged a projected drop in revenue and earnings in a volatile oil market. See our latest analysis for Occidental Petroleum. That recent drop comes after a choppy period where Occidental’s share price has a 30 day return of 7.9% and a 90 day return of 8.4%, even as the 1 year total shareholder return is slightly negative and the 5 year total shareholder return...
